input.sentences: we walked up the hill on the beach .
we spotted seals near the shore .
there was a lizard in it 's habitat .
lastly | we spotted a herd of kangaroos .
output.sentences: I walked up a hill and found a secret beach.
When I got there, I spotted a family of seals by the shore.
I saw a lizard in his natural habitat.
Watching the waters made me feel calm.
The last thing I thought I would spot on the beach was a kangaroo!
